channel.title: CNI-Overlay on Sujith Quintelier
channel.description: Recent content in CNI-Overlay on Sujith Quintelier

item.title: aks: Release 2025-08-29
item.description:
AKS v20250829 announces AKS Automatic general availability and multiple platform, networking, security, and component updates including new AKS patch versions, region expansions for API Server VNet Integration, Kubernetes 1.30 EOL, and several behavioral/observability changes.

  • Source: Release notes from AKS

item.title: azure: [Launched] Generally Available: CNI Overlay for Application Gateway for Containers and AGIC
item.description:
Azure CNI Overlay for Application Gateway for Containers (AGIC) is now generally available. It allows AKS clusters to assign pod IPs from a separate CIDR, conserving VNet IP space and simplifying multi-cluster deployments.

  • Source: Azure Updates
